title: UTW Spatial Wars - Watch Face
summary: An interactive watch face game : a Spatial Wars to save the galaxy and the stars
developerAddress:
4 Ruelle floricourt
97400 Saint Denis Reunion
France
description: IMPORTANT: Before tap interactions are enabled, your needs the latest version of Android Wear (v1.3) Features:- Animated starfield- Time Digital and Analogic- Date- Battery- 3D Parallax background- Interactive watch face game: Tap on the screen to kill ennemiesConfiguration:- Configure Battery refresh interval- Increase interactive mode duration- More stars or ships- Activate borderWarning: animation may use a lot of battery powerTo install:After install run 'resync app' on android wear if not availlableLong press your watch and choose UltrawatchTested with LG Watch RYour comments are welcome in French or English at the following address: support@reunidev.com
descriptionHTML:
IMPORTANT: Before tap interactions are enabled, your needs the latest version of Android Wear (v1.3)

Features:
- Animated starfield
- Time Digital and Analogic
- Date
- Battery
- 3D Parallax background
- Interactive watch face game: Tap on the screen to kill ennemies

Configuration:
- Configure Battery refresh interval
- Increase interactive mode duration
- More stars or ships
- Activate border

Warning: animation may use a lot of battery power

To install:
After install run 'resync app' on android wear if not availlable
Long press your watch and choose Ultrawatch

Tested with LG Watch R

Your comments are welcome in French or English at the following address: support@reunidev.com
recentChanges: switch between clock and game mode
